recipesJson.name: The My Dude Remix v2 (MyMan) #REMIXMONTH
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is another My Man attempt. It's better than My Man, but uses a diff chocolate. 
Made on Live Mixing - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IkNhaGXWg-U

reviews.text:
I literally just left your channel.. mixed this up and added 0.50% FA Cookie,  1% CAP Vanilla Whipped Cream V2 as I am out of (CAP) VBIC, 
left the CAP SS. .. I shook it up and vapped it and it's sweet, chewy Chocolate with the richness dialed back a bit by the brightness of strawberry.   Meringue makes it fluffy. topped off with vanilla Whipped cream.  I love it!
This is really good! Well balanced, I can definitely taste the notes of chocolate, strawberry and vanilla ice cream. Really enjoying this one!
